description: This Java class 'WikiParser' is a utility for parsing wiki-style text content into a graph structure with nodes and relationships. It identifies headings and links, constructs nodes with properties, and creates relationships based on link references within the content. The parser also generates Cypher queries for Neo4j graph database import.

classes.name: WikiParser
classes.description: A parser that converts wiki-style formatted text into a graph representation with nodes and relationships suitable for Neo4j.

methods.name: parse
methods.description: Parses wiki content, extracts headings and links, constructs nodes and relationships, and returns a GraphResult object containing the nodes, relationships, and generated Cypher script.
